"Great work and customer service." "We have a 9 year old retractable awning that we absolutely love!" "Jason (salesman) worked with our builder to make sure everything was perfect."

Jason the salesman was great.  Installation was quick and precise.   Everything was clean and perfect.   Highly recommend Southwest Shade Solutions for a first class shade solution.   Love our power shades!

Update: Jay from Southwest solutions came by and resolved this issue. Updating this to 4-star. Only reason for not doing 5-star is this shouldn't have taken a review tp get attention from the owners. But we are very appreciative of their … More Response from the owner Edited 4 months ago We completely understand your frustration with your current situation.  We apologize for the inconvenience and will work to find a solution for the issues you … More

We love our screens!  This has added a room to our house.  With the screens down, even in the heat of the day, it is cooler on our porch.  We are out here every day now.  I’m so glad we made this investment and Southwest Shades did a great job with installation.
